00070 #include <cmath>
00071 #include "ReClaM/ModelInterface.h"

00073 //===========================================================================
00088 class CE : virtual public ModelInterface {
00089  public:
00090 
00091 //===========================================================================
00121   double ce(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &out,
00122             double min = 0, double max = 1.) {
00123     double ce = 0;
00124     if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00125       Array<double> output(out.dim(0));
00126       model(in, output);
00127       takeAll(output, min, max);
00128       if(out != output) ce++;
00129     } else {
00130       Array<double> output(out.dim(1));
00131       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00132         model(in[pattern], output);
00133         takeAll(output, min, max);
00134 
00135         for(unsigned i = 0; i < output.nelem(); i++) {
00136           if(out[pattern](i) != output(i)) {
00137             ce++;
00138             break;
00139           }
00140         }
00141       }
00142       ce /= in.dim(0);
00143     }
00144     return ce;
00145   }
00146 
00147 
00148  private:
00149 
00150   // Transforms a linear vector into a bitvector by using
00151   // the threshold value of 0.5. All values greater than
00152   // 0.5 are set to 1 all other values to zero.
00153   //
00154   void takeAll(Array<double> &a, double min, double max) {
00155     for(unsigned i = 0; i < a.nelem(); i++) {
00156       if(a(i) > (max + min) / 2.) a(i) = max;
00157       else a(i) = min;
00158     }
00159   }
00160 };
00161 
00162 #endif
